name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 026
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Han Shot First. George Lucas is wrong, and the only real version of A New Hope is the first version!  Why?! Because HAN. SHOT. FIRST! Color palette represents Han on one side, Greedo on the other, and blaster fire in the middle.
